bug.author: zyberg2091
bug.summary: Doc : keras.utils.plot_model prints the shape as (None, n) but outdated (?, n) is given in doc
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/keras/functional>https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/keras/functional</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
keras.utils.plot_model prints the shape as (None, n) but given in doc as (?, n) <denchmark-h:h3>Clear description</denchmark-h>
Watch the line keras.utils.plot_model(model, "my_first_model_with_shape_info.png", show_shapes=True) in the doc link provided above.The output shown there is outdated <denchmark-h:h3>Correct links</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/19dlb-Qcoo2EBDigpZ8E75cb63woYI_EI?usp=sharing>Gist</denchmark-link> here to show the changes. Tensorflow version: 2.4 <denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
Yes

comments.comment: A PR has to be merged with keras team but it was mentioned in the tensorflow documentation.so i opened it here.
Hello! I am new to the open source community and would like to contribute to this issue.
